title: The Outbreak Conspiracy Volume 1: Fight Against a Criminal Regime
description: In an alternate universe, the ultimate weapon has just been unleashedâ€”and only one man can change the course of history as the global pandemic wreaks havoc around the globe. Will the Great States of America (GSA) and the Chinese Communist Republic (CCR) declare full scale war on one another? Not if the Resistance can stop it.The Outbreak Conspiracy Volume 1 - Fighting Against a Criminal Regime, is the first chapter of a new graphic novel series by Jorge Sheldon, featuring art by Ranjit Seth Balmuchu. It's a breath-taking visual novel that plunges readers into a fascinating alternate history. Nothing is as it seems, and the world stands on the brink of annihilation. Current events meet a multiverse sci-fi adventure in this groundbreaking new series. Be sure not to miss it...
author: Jorge Sheldon
